q1.question: How long is the demo?
q1.answer: Demos typically run 30 minutes, but we can adjust based on your needs. Complex implementations may require 45-60 minutes.

q2.question: Is there any obligation after the demo?
q2.answer: Absolutely not. The demo is simply to help you understand if WellPlan is the right fit. No pressure, no aggressive follow-ups.

q3.question: Can I invite my team?
q3.answer: Yes! We encourage you to bring anyone who would be using the platform. The more stakeholders, the better questions we can answer.

q4.question: What should I prepare?
q4.answer: Think about your current pain points, the tools you're using, and your goals. That helps us customize the demo to your situation.

cta.title: Ready to get started now?
cta.subtitle: Skip the demo and start your free 14-day trial. No credit card required.

roiPage.headline: Calculate Your
roiPage.description: See exactly how much time and money WellPlan can save your business every month.
roiPage.freeTrial: 14-day free trial, no credit card required
roiPage.freeMigration: Free migration from your current tools
roiPage.methodologyText: Our ROI calculator uses industry-average improvement rates based on data from thousands of WellPlan customers. Actual results may vary based on your industry, current processes, and implementation. The estimates assume: 25% improvement in close rates through better lead nurturing and follow-up, 15% increase in captured leads through omnichannel engagement, and 60% reduction in manual tasks through automation.

intro.title: 1. Introduction
intro.content: WellPlan ("we", "our", or "us") is committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our platform and services.

collect.title: 2. Information We Collect
collect.content: We collect information you provide directly to us, including:
collect.items: Account information (name, email, password)|Billing information (payment method, billing address)|Business information (company name, industry)|Communications you send to us|Content you create using our platform

use.title: 3. How We Use Your Information
use.content: We use the information we collect to:
use.items: Provide, maintain, and improve our services|Process transactions and send related information|Send technical notices, updates, and support messages|Respond to your comments, questions, and requests|Monitor and analyze trends, usage, and activities|Detect, investigate, and prevent fraudulent transactions

sharing.title: 4. Information Sharing
sharing.content: We do not sell, trade, or otherwise transfer your personal information to third parties without your consent, except as described in this policy. We may share information with service providers who assist us in operating our platform, conducting our business, or serving our users.

security.title: 5. Data Security
security.content: We implement appropriate technical and organizational security measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction. However, no method of transmission over the Internet is 100% secure.

rights.title: 6. Your Rights
rights.items: Access the personal information we hold about you|Request correction of inaccurate information|Request deletion of your information|Object to processing of your information|Request data portability

cookies.title: 7. Cookies
cookies.content: We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to track activity on our platform and hold certain information. You can instruct your browser to refuse all cookies or to indicate when a cookie is being sent.

changes.title: 8. Changes to This Policy
changes.content: We may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page and updating the "Last updated" date.

contact.title: 9. Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at

acceptance.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By accessing or using WellPlan's services, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service and all applicable laws and regulations. If you do not agree with any of these terms, you are prohibited from using or accessing our services.

description.title: 2. Description of Service
description.content: WellPlan provides a marketing automation and CRM platform that enables businesses to capture leads, nurture relationships, and close deals. Our services include but are not limited to email marketing, SMS messaging, landing pages, forms, and integrations with third-party services.

registration.title: 3. Account Registration
registration.content: To use our services, you must:
registration.items: Be at least 18 years old|Provide accurate and complete registration information|Maintain the security of your account credentials|Promptly update any changes to your information|Accept responsibility for all activities under your account

acceptable.title: 4. Acceptable Use
acceptable.content: You agree not to use our services to:
acceptable.items: Send unsolicited or unauthorized advertising (spam)|Violate any applicable laws or regulations|Infringe on intellectual property rights|Transmit malicious code or interfere with our systems|Harass, abuse, or harm others|Collect user information without consent

payment.title: 5. Payment Terms
payment.content: Paid services are billed in advance on a monthly or annual basis. All fees are non-refundable except as required by law or as explicitly stated in these terms. We reserve the right to change our prices with 30 days notice.

ip.title: 6. Intellectual Property
ip.content: The WellPlan platform, including its original content, features, and functionality, is owned by KLABS Ventures LLC and is protected by international copyright, trademark, and other intellectual property laws. You retain ownership of content you create using our platform.

liability.title: 7. Limitation of Liability
liability.content: To the maximum extent permitted by law, WellPlan shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages, or any loss of profits or revenues, whether incurred directly or indirectly, or any loss of data, use, goodwill, or other intangible losses.

termination.title: 8. Termination
termination.content: We may terminate or suspend your account immediately, without prior notice or liability, for any reason, including breach of these Terms. Upon termination, your right to use the service will immediately cease.

changes.title: 9. Changes to Terms
changes.content: We reserve the right to modify or replace these Terms at any time. If a revision is material, we will provide at least 30 days notice prior to any new terms taking effect.

contact.title: 10. Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions about these Terms, please contact us at

aiBotPage.headline: AI That Books
aiBotPage.subtitle: Put AI in your WhatsApp & Telegram that qualifies leads and books appointments ‚Äî synced with your calendar in real-time. Never miss a booking again.

whatsapp.title: WhatsApp & Telegram
whatsapp.desc: AI lives where your customers are

booking.title: 24/7 Booking
booking.desc: Never miss a lead, even at 3am

aiBotPage.channelsTitle: Deploy AI on your favorite messaging apps
aiBotPage.featuresSubtitle: Enterprise-grade AI that solves complex problems with safer, more accurate answers than any chatbot on the market.

calendar.title: Real-Time Calendar Sync
calendar.description: AI checks your live calendar availability before offering time slots. No double bookings, no manual back-and-forth. Syncs with Google Calendar, Outlook, and more.

qualification.title: Smart Lead Qualification
qualification.description: AI asks qualifying questions before booking. Filter out tire-kickers and only book meetings with qualified prospects who are ready to buy.

conversations.title: Natural Conversations
conversations.description: Human-like chat that varies phrasing, adjusts tone based on context, and gently refocuses off-topic replies. Customers won't know it's a bot.

timezone.title: Timezone Intelligence
timezone.description: Automatically detects customer timezone and shows availability in their local time. Perfect for businesses with international clients.

confirmations.title: Instant Confirmations
confirmations.description: Send booking confirmations, reminders, and follow-ups automatically. Reduce no-shows with smart reminder sequences.

team.title: Team Calendars
team.description: Route bookings to the right team member based on service type, availability, or round-robin. Perfect for teams and agencies.

training.title: Train Your AI in
training.subtitle: No coding required. Multiple ways to teach your AI about your business.

urls.title: Website URLs
urls.description: Point AI to your website, FAQs, or any public URL. It learns your business instantly.

qa.title: Q&A Pairs
qa.description: Add custom question-answer pairs for specific scenarios and edge cases.

feedback.title: Feedback Loop
feedback.description: Use thumbs up/down on responses to fine-tune AI behavior over time.

trial.title: Free Bot Trial
trial.description: Test your AI in a sandbox before going live. No charges.

step1.title: Connect Channels
step1.desc: Link SMS, WhatsApp, Instagram, Facebook, or website chat. Select which channels AI responds on.

step2.title: Train Your AI
step2.desc: Add your website URLs, FAQs, and Q&A pairs. AI learns your business instantly. Training is free!

step3.title: Choose Your Mode
step3.desc: Start with Suggestive mode to approve responses, then switch to Auto-Pilot for full automation.

example.title: See How It Books Appointments

setup.q: What's included in the setup fee?
setup.a: The $497 setup fee covers your dedicated snapshot configuration, custom fields, pipelines, automations, and a 1-on-1 onboarding session to ensure everything is set up for your specific needs.

onboarding.a: Most partners are fully set up within 48-72 hours. We'll schedule your onboarding call right after payment, and you'll have access to your account immediately.

cancel.q: Is there a contract or can I cancel anytime?
cancel.a: No long-term contracts. You can cancel anytime. We also offer a 14-day money-back guarantee if you're not satisfied.

aboutPage.headline: About
aboutPage.subtitle: We're on a mission to help businesses grow by making powerful marketing automation accessible to everyone.
aboutPage.missionP1: We believe every business deserves access to enterprise-grade marketing tools. WellPlan combines CRM, automation, and AI into one platform that's powerful enough for agencies yet simple enough for solopreneurs.
aboutPage.missionP2: Founded in 2024, we've helped thousands of businesses capture more leads, nurture relationships at scale, and close deals faster than ever before.

setup.question: How long does setup take?
setup.answer: Self-Setup: You can be live in a day with our video tutorials. Done-With-You: We'll have you set up within 3-5 business days. Done-For-You: Full system build takes 1-2 weeks.

technical.question: Do I need any technical skills?
technical.answer: Not at all! Our Done-With-You and Done-For-You plans handle everything technical. Even Self-Setup comes with step-by-step video guides that anyone can follow.

switch.question: Can I switch plans later?
switch.answer: Yes! You can upgrade anytime. If you start with Self-Setup and decide you want more help, we'll credit your setup fee toward a higher tier.

integrations.question: What integrations do you support?
integrations.answer: WellPlan integrates with 200+ tools including Zoom, Google Calendar, Stripe, PayPal, Calendly, and more. We also have a Zapier integration for anything else.

cancel.question: Is there a contract or can I cancel anytime?
cancel.answer: No long-term contracts. You can cancel your subscription anytime. Setup fees are one-time and non-refundable.
